website_summaries.verdict: Includes a nice collection of tricks. Good set for kids new to magic. Offered at a desirable price point.
pros: Most tricks are easy to learn
Kids can learn from DVD or printed instructions
Plenty of props inside the box
Aimed at ages 4 and up, but young children will need help
cons: Tricks are too simple for older kids
Some questions over longevity of parts

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I bought this for my 9 year old son and he loved it. The surprise was my 3 year old grand daughter who loved it too. The kids have done some magic shows for the family. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids aged 4-8
customer_reviews.text: David Copperfield, Harry Houdini, Penn & Teller...add my kids to the list! My four year old and my seven year old are obsessed with magic and magicians, so I bought them this set. The tricks are easy to learn, and even my four year old was able to master most of them. They are convincing enough that they fooled me the first few times. It's been a while since we bought the set, but the kids continue to pull it out every time a new audience comes to the house. Definitely a great find. Their favorite trick is probably the ball in the cup, but they also enjoy the disappearing crayons.
customer_reviews.author: dhoped123

customer_reviews.title: Item description mentions codes for online video- which are not available... don't waste money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 6 year old son so he can show magic to his friend on his birthday. The Item description mentions codes for online video is included in package. When you go the site to unlock videos it mentions videos are not online available.. What a waste of money and time... Now we need to figure from book how to do magic tricks...it is a huge disappointment and inappropriate item description.. this box is aprox. $30.. there is no way I would have paid for cheap quality plastic items for $30 if I knew we have to figure magic trick by ourselves.....
customer_reviews.author: Jigar S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set for my 7 year old. He opened it right away and figured out 3 or 4 tricks in 30 minutes from watching the videos. There is a piece of paper in the box that directs you to go to their website and watch the online tutorial videos. They are pretty thorough. He actually took a couple of the tricks to school and showed the kids. They loved them. His favorites are the ball in the vase trick and the crayons in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Nice little box of tricks! Daughter isn't super into magic, but needed a little gift and thought she'd enjoy this. She's had fun with it! Decent amount of tricks, easy to learn, her 4 yr old brother thinks she's amazing! We even caught her dad poking around in it after one of her magic shows to figure out exactly how she did it. Not something I'd buy for a child who already knows a bit about magic, but great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old can do it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son had fun learning how to do these magic tricks. Some of them he intuitively knew from just playing around with the materials on his own (ie: trick doors, etc), so I would say the description of "easy" would be correct. The props generally seemed to be of good quality and didn't look as if they would chip/break easily from rough 5 year old play. The tricks are easy and fun enough that I think it would be a good gift for any child and not only ones with specific interest in magic.
customer_reviews.author: SYK

customer_reviews.title: So fun and easy for kids to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter (6) loves this. She got it for Christmas and is still playing with it. It was easy for her to learn. Her grandma read the instructions for her so the rest of the family didn't know all the secrets. Great entertainment for all of us. She also taught her 4 year old brother to do the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Ware

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: This magic kit is so cool!!! I actually had a lot of fun learning how to do the tricks and everything is good quality. I say it's a great toy/gift however it's a little advanced for my 4 year old son to understand and properly perform. I didn't give it a bad review bc my son might just be delayed and other 4year olds might get it just fine so not a reason to not buy it. Cool tricks, can't wait to re-introduce it to him next year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Vase broke very quickly
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old son was really enjoying learning the tricks, but a few minutes after getting to vase and ball the vase snapped in half. Very flimsy. He's disappointed and so am I. Overall was going well, and though some of the tricks are repetitive, mostly concerned at how fragile some of these pieces are.
customer_reviews.author: Corbett family

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners Magic Set
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this magic set for beginners! Decent quality, age appropriate and reasonably priced. My son AND husband have really enjoyed this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: They are fun tricks for little kids that are not too complicated
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It is the quality you would expect from a kid's magic set. I got this for my 6 yo for Christmas. He made me leave the room so he could watch the instructional dvd by himself, so I do not know how helpful that is, he didn't want me knowing how the tricks were done. But when I came back he could do about half of the tricks right off the bat by himself. Some of them he struggled with but after some practice he can do almost all of them now. They are fun tricks for little kids that are not too complicated. My 10 yo daughter enjoys playing with it too
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Broken inside box.
customer_reviews.text: :( bought this in advance for my sons birthday. The ball trick is broken though...he is having a blast with all the other tricks but the ball trick is one of the easiest first tricks to learn so I am.a but bummed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived the plastic wrap appeared to have been not factory sealed. I took it off and opened it to see if all parts were there and they are in a generic plastic bag. Since checking into it and finding that the Ideal Toy Co went out of business in '97 I truly believe this is a repackaged product. (Which it doesn't indicate in the description.) I kept it as sending it back would cost me money. Would I buy it again, no.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suddenly wanted to learn some magic tricks. We searched amazon and decided on this kit. The tricks are easy to learn and very good. We were able to combine several of the tricks to expand the illusion. Pretty fun!
customer_reviews.author: chetholt

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it but the quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo got this for her birthday and loved it! It's been a month and half of the "tricks" have broken or ripped. Its totally age appropriate and the tricks are easy to learn but the quality of the materials is lacking. All of the cardboard pieces in ours was bent or creased making some of the tricks obvious. That being said she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Some cute magic tricks
customer_reviews.text: I got a really good deal for this on amazon prime day and gave it to my kids for Christmas (6 and 8). We spent about an hour going through the different tricks and the kids caught on pretty quickly. Some of the tricks, like the box with the drawers are neat and work well, while some don’t work so well, like the disappearing crayons. My kids are planning a magic show for later. It’s definitely a cute magic show kit for beginners and has some fun things for them to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with kids ranging from 4-10!
customer_reviews.text: While the youngest wasn’t able to do much in the way of tricks, the 7, 9 and 10 year old were able to do so. The instruction booklet included isn’t the easiest to follow, but the free streaming video you get access to is fantastic! The kids were riveted and got the tricks right away. Great family present!! And great magic show they put on! Loads of family fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: But this!!!!! My son is 5yr old and LOVING this set. It’s so perfect for him the tricks are fun and he is blowing his 4 yr old little sisters mind! Haha. Even adults have a hard time figuring out some of his tricks. I think it a great beginner set. I would totally going to buy other set from this company when he is ready for them. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for children! Fun alternative to technology.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year-old nephew loved this as a Christmas present. He had never performed any magic tricks before, so I taught him the tricks one by one and he was able to learn most of them quite easily. The tricks are simple enough for a child to perform, but still some of them are rather interesting to watch even for adults. The kit has everything you need and it definitely provides healthy entertainment for the family. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Magician
customer_reviews.text: This box is full of easy tricks for your child to learn along with a magical wand. My son is 5 and he learned the box trick within minutes and put on a magic show for the family. The box comes with an instructional DVD to help your child and parents learn the tricks. I was just as excited learning as I was watching him perform.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chelf

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh, not very fun for kids. Instructions are confusing, so we turned to the recommended website for "how-to" videos, but the site never works. Not very cool tricks. The lollipop one is pretty cute, that's about it. My 6 year liked about three tricks and that was it. Definitely NOT WORTH THE MONEY. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner magic set
customer_reviews.text: A good beginner set. My grandson was so thrilled. He has been watching the Magician's Code and knew how some of the tricks were done but didn't have the special trick boxes, etc. There are online instructions for those who need/want more instruction. The tricks are too hard, but you may want to watch a professional perform them a few times. Very happy w/ the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Phoots

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children/low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this is for a 4 year old. Or a year later, a 5 year old. The wand is pretty much the only thing that gets used. The tricks are either too elaborate for that age, or too cheaply made to withstand the not so nimble fingers of 4 and 5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Villani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's 5th birthday and she still pulls it out regularly months later. I love that there were some really basic tricks that she could master easily, but there were also some trickier ones that I could impress her with that she's going to love doing down the road. It's also been great watching her put her own twist on the tricks provided! Great gift for any curious kid.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn wallin

customer_reviews.title: I should've just purchased a magic wond
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7yo daughter. She fell in love with the box. Once she opened it, she started playing with the magic wond and completely disregarded the rest of the set... she loves magic, and she loves learning new things... this on the other hand wasn't entertaining enough. I purchased an expensive magic wond
customer_reviews.author: Caliuso

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a dvd as advertized. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I am furious! DO NOT buy this! The product says it comes with a dvd. It does not!!! My grand daughter does not have the internet I bought this because it said it came WITH a dvd! Am getting more and more things from Amazon that are not as disciribed. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old nephew LOVED this set
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old nephew LOVED this set. The box that things disappear into is awesome. The picture that goes from black and white to color seems poorly made, or perhaps he somehow messed it up because it wouldn't go back in after the first use. And after a couple of rougher cousins came over, some of the plastic parts ended up cracked. Overall, though, it was great. Except for when my nephew asked me if there was such a thing as REAL magic...how to answer that without disappointing a boy who desperately wants to really make something disappear?
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: My five and eight year old boys love this magic set
customer_reviews.text: My five and eight year old boys love this magic set! They were both able to complete the tricks after watching the DVD. It was great seeing my 5 year old show his new tricks to his friends, and they also enjoy performing the tricks with each other. The tricks are easy to do, but pretty convincing if done correctly :) I would definitely recommend this magic set, even to a younger child! (But do watch the DVD to get the most out of this set!)
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8yr-old daughter and she played with it all day. The interest has definitely subsided after she did each trick but overall, it was worth it. The quality for some items was great, others could have been made better but it's a beginners magic kit for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: ahafer

customer_reviews.title: Played with it for about 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Only good if the kid you by it for has the patience to read and follow the directions. My 8 year old nephew did not, even though he will assemble 500 piece LEGO sets all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Basault

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The disappearing nap vase and the magic paint card broke within 12 hours of opening the product. The box through the wand is poorly constructed so that it does not work. Another magic trick broke 3 months after having the product with very minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Magic for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: We gave this kit to our granddaughter for Christmas. She is five years old. She has had loads of fun performing the magic tricks for family members. Even her four year old sister tries to do them! A couple of tricks are more suited for an older child. I highly recommend this product for a young beginner.
customer_reviews.author: laman1girl

customer_reviews.title: Great magic, for the sake of magic. Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to learn (especially with included CD) even for younger kids and fun to show off all these tricks. Kids tell me that magicians these days say, "this is a trick" or " this is an illusion" and then later explain how they did the trick. Heck with that. Let's make magic and have others believe in magic (eg, let's believe in Santa as long as possible}. Wishing you all happy magic making.
customer_reviews.author: bayareakirk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 years old and loves this magic kit. The fact that it comes with a video is great. Although she can read, seeing the tricks performed along with the tips and way the magician presented them was a perfect way for her to learn the tricks without an adult's help. She was so proud when she was able to then perform them for us and none of us knew her secrets. We were actually stumped on a couple of them and she was thrilled! Great first set for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT! OUR FAMILY HAD A BLAST AT CHRISTMAS WITH THIS GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it! Can watch the video by himself to figure it out. The tricks are cool. Perfect Christmas present! We found a bag he can use for his "tool kit" and we put all the pieces in there. There was one trick we couldn't find on the video, but we found it in the printed instructions. all the tricks are cool, but especially the magic box and the color cube. My niece was enthralled as my husband totally tricked the kids with the magic box (he figured that one out before they watched the DVD, and he totally had them just loving it!
customer_reviews.author: KrisMarieCPA

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7, and has been in to pranks and magic tricks. This is perfect. I had to go through the tricks/instructions for the first time, but she was able to do all the magic tricks herself after me. Other magic kits have been a bit too hard for her to pull off, but this was perfect for her age and tiny hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sacrab2001

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: The perfect magic set for my 4 year old. He didn't quit understand the magic, but it still excited him. As he would do a trick, he was convinced he was magic. Lol. Very easy tricks. A lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: THis is a great starter magic kit for kids. My daughter received it two months ago for Christmas and still likes to play with it. The tricks are easy enough for her to figure out (she's 8), and they are tricky enough that she stumps all the adults watching her show. A great gift that will prove enjoyable for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters ages 4 and 6 loved it. They had a great time showing tricks to their parents. I learned the tricks pretty easily but I had to practice then in order to amaze my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Edu4Eating

customer_reviews.title: missing instructions - otherwise would have been a great present.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to get this because she is fascinated with magicians and magic tricks. however it was disappointing because we did not get the instructions with the box and are unable to access the training videos so basically my daughter can't "learn" how to do the magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! My 7 year old loved it. He performed in front of his friends on his brother's bday party and the kids were awe about it . Pros: props are great and easy to perform even for 7 year old . Cons : Instructions are not kids friendly. It's not easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Shivi

customer_reviews.title: Easiest magic trick box you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased other magic boxes before but this was by far the simplest and easiest to learn. Within an hour my 8 year old was able to show 5 to 6 magic tricks to wow everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maira Khan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Days
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for our grandson. He loved the dress up hat and gloves. The cards were a little cheap but the magic wand was a win!!! Great product for the price. Hours of fun and creative learning!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Duke

customer_reviews.title: Boy and Girl 5 and 7 LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!  Welcome to the world of MAGIC : )
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing for my ex-girlfriends little kidz, a boy and a girl, 5 and 7 and they went BANANAS for it!!! Big hit. They've put on more than a few magic shows for friends and family. Just did one inviting their friends and friends parents over for their biggest show yet. $$ well spent.
customer_reviews.author: will potter

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! I can't tell you how many magic sets for kids are out there that are just too complicated or have too many magic tricks to learn. This one was perfect for my 4.5 year old nephew. The parents appreciated its simplicity and he had a blast putting on a show, esecially tricking his older sister. There was one trick that actually fooled me! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: The children have had a blast doing these tricks. I didn't even help them with these. My 10-year-old read the instructions and put on a magic show with 2 of her siblings for the rest of us. It took me a while to figure out how they did it all. We all had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Turk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I was debating for a couple of days to buy it or not, I’m so glad I pulled the trigger. It was carefully packaged and delivered without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Abracadabra.. it's fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter bought this with her birthday money and has had a lot of fun learning the tricks. She took one of them into school and did it infront of her class as her special talent - it was a huge hit. The quality of some of the tricks were just ok while on others was great. Definately worth it for the money and entertainment. The instruction video is very well done. Personally, she was a little disappointed to find out that magic is tricks and not magic at all! Was a good life lesson anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8 Year-Old Son
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 8 year-old son. I wasn't sure if it would be too baby-ish or too cheap & break easily. For the money, it is GREAT! He has been able to do a lot with it! It has kept his interest. Because of the inexpensive price I had low expectations, and this definitely exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The Magic of a child's smile
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a wonderful gift for our 6 yr old. Amazed at each trick shown to her and just as proud when doing it herself. The CD-DVD instruction is great. Nice quality props and will keep her happy for a long time with her family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wei

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little set. I bought it for my 6 year old son for Christmas. He goes back and forth between saying it was his favorite or second favorite gift. He has mastered about 7 tricks and is already making them his own. The instructions are very easy to understand and the tricks are very simple to recreate. Some are a bit obvious, but some are really good. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Shissler

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old just opened today but so far so good. The tricks are all easy for him to do. This is his first magic set and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great gift. My six year old loved learning these tricks and showing them to his grandparents. Even I was in awe of how he was doing them. Very creative, and hours of fun. Would highly recommend for creative fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cphillips

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old son for christmas. The tricks in this kit are great. He was able to fool his uncles with these tricks to the point they were demanding to see it again and again.. it was a fun kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Good magic kit for ages 5 to 7
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. Kids really enjoyed it. Liked some pieces better than others. Didn't last long though, smaller pieces got lost. Wish it came with a box or bag to store all the pieces, original box didn't last. I would recommend for ages 5 to 7. Any older the tricks might be too generic.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyW

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew. Shortly after opening it, he dropped the ball in a cup trick from about 2 feet (he's 5) onto a hardwood floor. The ball holder broke in half. Had they spent just a few more cents on manufacturing the pieces, it could have been a 20 year toy, not a 2 hour toy. But they cheaped out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for older children
customer_reviews.text: My four year old was excited to get this but he was only interested in the "magic" wand. I would not recommend this for any children under the age 5 because some of the tricks require lots of practice. The typical child under the age of 5 does not have the attention span to continuously practice so that the tricks can be performed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 6/7 year old boy. He had a blast playing with it and figuring out the tricks. He enjoyed playing tricks on all of us and his family. It kept his attention for the day and I was told he played with it again but haven't seen it out since. It's a great starter set and highly recommended. The only thing that would make it better, is a hat!
customer_reviews.author: Terri W.

customer_reviews.title: Great set-but missing piece
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson LOVES this magic set- unfortunately one of the half size crayons were missing so that trick doesn't look as good as it could. I tried to send a note to the seller, but the only option i had wads to return the entire set so i guess we will just live with it. I only gave it four stars because of the missing crayon
customer_reviews.author: KJames

customer_reviews.title: It's inexpensive for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Tricks are easy to learn. Items are cheaply made. We have three different magic sets now and one of the wands is broken after a very short amount of time. A decent buy for younger kids, but not for someone serious about learning magic.
customer_reviews.author: Vande Kieft

customer_reviews.title: Great for aspiring magician
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son, he has been dabbling in magic, this is a perfect kit for him, the price is perfect, much cheaper that buying at the magic stores. There are great videos that can be unlocked online that give you demonstrations how each magic works!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawgs Fam

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for 6 / 7 years old
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old had great fun, although some of the experiments are challenging for his age. I doubt a 4 year old (as advertised on the box) has the dexterity to do them all or grasp the technique required.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Great start for young kids/beginners.. nothing special.. just a simple easy cheap set.. after the first day my 7 year old daughter put it away and hasn't picked it back up.. def for young kids..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wommack

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this. I think she has done a magic show just about every day since she got it. She had friends over and did a show for them as soon as they were in. The tricks are really easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: reddraco

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson really enjoys this! He tries a new trick all the time :) he is almost 8 and it's right up his alley :)
customer_reviews.author: bhappy

customer_reviews.title: Set is good! But, there is no dvd!
customer_reviews.text: There is no DVD inside! There is a website they want you to enter a code they gave you, but the website does not open!
customer_reviews.author: fuat

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my best friend's daughter for Xmas. She's 5 and LOVED this set. It was a huge hit. It's Feb and she's still talking about it and playing with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Keribou24

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old son loves it, and it's filled with easy to learn and perform tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Eveanyn

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a show.
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a box of props, and instructions on how to use then for tricks. I would say this is for 10 and up. The pieces require some skill to operate. And the instruction book is at least a 4th grade reading level
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Magic set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this multiple times and she has loved it. I bought it for her as she had a talent show coming up and she wanted to do magic. She was the hit of the talent show and she was incredibly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great magic set for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really good set. My granddaughter is almost seven. She watches the DVD -- which is excellent -- and learns the tricks easily. An excellent set. And the tricks themselves are well made, and work as they should.
customer_reviews.author: al becker

customer_reviews.title: My kids lost interest, but cute tricks!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and my 5 year olds still pull them out sometimes. There is a mix of complexities, but I don't think they really found something they could really do themselves, so they made up their own tricks. Good idea, but maybe my kids were too young?
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: 7-year-old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old caught on very quickly and has been doing all kinds of tricks. She'll be a pro magician in no time.
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: ... now bought it for our next granddaughter and am disappointed! Opened it up to find half broken pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this same kit for our oldest granddaughter a couple of years ago and now bought it for our next granddaughter and am disappointed! Opened it up to find half broken pieces that are important to make the tricks work, the crayons had the tops broken off, etc. Not very happy with IDEAL right now because the other magic kit we bought also has issues!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Ebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great first set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old granddaughter's birthday. She loved it and had an awesome time doing a magic show at her party. Decent amount of tricks to do if your just starting but she did require adult help to do them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Okay magic set
customer_reviews.text: This magic set is okay. My son was excited to get it for his 6th birthday. He broke a couple of the pieces right away so that was disappointing but I would say it is worth it for the price. He enjoys learning the tricks with daddy. :)
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great. Grandson loved.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved. Was so proud and surprised he could do magic!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson just loves this. The tricks are easy for him, but actually rather impressive. I think this is a great introduction to magic, especially for a child who has indicated interest in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Marks

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a cubscouts meeting for 1st graders and they loved it. The tricks were easy to learn and very entertaining. Even my husband got a kick out of playing with the set. I would recommend this set for any beginners at any age.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.

customer_reviews.title: Poof money disappeared
customer_reviews.text: It was mostly package and not much to it. My kid did not enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Pell

customer_reviews.title: can we get replacement pieces?
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughters 5th birthday. Unwrapping it was very exciting but within the day, 2 pieces were broken and some were missing. It should really come with some kind of case or bag! Can we get replacement pieces? We haven't even had a chance to learn the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Micah James

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for my sons talent show. The tricks were easy to complete and it was worth the money although the items are not as durable as you would hope. Does the job and was fun and entertaining for an upcoming magician
customer_reviews.author: Laura Funk

customer_reviews.title: Only 14 tricks NOT 25!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Half the tricks (of the listed 25) are not even performed with the props provided. What a disappointment and very deceiving to find that out. Otherwise, the few tricks that can be done with the provided materials are cute and great for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: 2 things broke very easily...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew was so excited to receive this kid for his birthday! He was actually at his party and the little red cup with the ball snapped apart. Next the hidden box cracked. He finally gave up and I was very sad the quality was so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Yoj

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product to get kids to learn magic if you want to tell them magic isn't real. Not high quality stuff but just like any other kids toy after a month or so they forget about it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a dvd
customer_reviews.text: The kit is good for my 5 and 7 year old. Some older top reviews mention a dvd. There is not a dvd included anymore. Only online codes to access videos. A dvd would be nice if I didn’t want to have to use a tablet or computer to show the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. One of the pieces were broken I would be willing to rate 5 stars if that weren't the case. I don't know how to contact seller to ask for replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ragen Clifton

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 5 year old son. Such a great gift he loves it and the tricks are super easy to learn with a big effect.
customer_reviews.author: Devin P

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit just needs an adult to help learn the magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun To Encourage Kids Performing & Vocabulary
customer_reviews.text: Fun activities for kids when playing dressup, encourages performing skills
customer_reviews.author: Judith B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old grandson really enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our grandson who is 5 and likes to perform. Some tricks were too difficult but there were enough that after watching the video and a little help from adults that he learned to do. He could do them well enough that he could perform a magic show for his preschool class. I made a little black cape for him and purchased a magician hat from Amazon. Class loved it and he has gotten his use out of it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: 5+ Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! I got this for my 6 year old great-niece who is a budding magician. She went wild when she got it! I got it for her birthday in November and she is still doing magic shows with it. I would give it 10 stars if I could for the joy it has brought her.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Fun assortment, but unfortunately not made well. The disappearing crayon trick arrived torn and was rendered unusable after only a day of my kiddo practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany's Tallies

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit
customer_reviews.text: Our 4-1/2 year old daughter loves it! The tricks range from super easy to needing a little practice which is most of the fun. We highly recommend this. Simple but fun!
customer_reviews.author: Apasionado

customer_reviews.title: Grandson, the Magician
customer_reviews.text: Grandson, the Magician loved it. Put on quite a show
customer_reviews.author: Doug Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Great magic set for a young child.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y/o son really enjoyed this. The tricks are fairly simple and easy for a 5 y/o to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: 5 yr old had a lot of fun performing for family during the holidays. Would have been nice if the set came in a plastic suitcase of sorts because there are many pieces that can easily get lost. Children do not do well when pieces are kept in a box as opposed to a snap-shut container. An adult needs to commit to helping child learn each trick which are easy to master but guidance is very important.
customer_reviews.author: grace m

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for 7 year old boy or girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 7 year old boy and a 7 year old girl, they both loved it. Good quality materials, easy to learn tricks, entertaining for all.
customer_reviews.author: Rosella DePass

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces
customer_reviews.text: A little cheap looking but as long as you take care of it it’ll last. A lot of pieces so i wouldn’t throw the box away. Instructions are easy to follow and it’s fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old saw a magic show and loved it. I gave him this for his birthday and he just loved showing everyone that he was magic too! Good for little hands, not too difficult. We haven’t tried all of the tricks yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Ideal My First Magic Show Magic Set
product_meta.description: Our easiest tricks designed specifically for small hands, This is a great beginners magic set. Like all cadaco magic sets the trick are easy to learn and easy to perform with a professional result. Lots of great tricks and even a magic wand and comes with DVD instructions that go step by step showing how to perform the tricks.
feature_bullets: 25 easy to learn tricks and high quality props
Perfect for children who are new to the art of magic
Make candy disappear, vanish a coin, make crayons travel and much more
Includes 31 props and pieces to perform 25 tricks with instructions and codes for online videos
Recommended for children 4 years of age and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,531 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
